model.name: crypto
model.title: Crypto (Java Cryptographic Extension)
model.description: Encrypt and decrypt messages using Java Cryptography Extension (JCE).
model.label: dataformat,transformation,security

algorithm.description: The JCE algorithm name indicating the cryptographic algorithm that will be used.

keyRef.description: Refers to the secret key to lookup from the register to use.

cryptoProvider.label: advanced
cryptoProvider.description: The name of the JCE Security Provider that should be used.

initVectorRef.label: advanced
initVectorRef.description: Refers to a byte array containing the Initialization Vector that will be used to initialize the Cipher.

algorithmParameterRef.label: advanced
algorithmParameterRef.description: A JCE AlgorithmParameterSpec used to initialize the Cipher. Will lookup the type using the given name as a java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec type.

bufferSize.description: The size of the buffer used in the signature process.

macAlgorithm.description: The JCE algorithm name indicating the Message Authentication algorithm.

shouldAppendHMAC.description: Flag indicating that a Message Authentication Code should be calculated and appended to the encrypted data.

inline.label: advanced
inline.description: Flag indicating that the configured IV should be inlined into the encrypted data stream. Is by default false.
